Quote from GM Retser: http://forums.play.net/forums/19/218/3305/view/891

Hey everyone, you can now use your "PREMIUM" cooldown of the Settlement of Reim to participate in Reim Fortress Defense.

Retser, ASGM

Evarin
Tuesday, September 26th, 2017, 4:46:28 PM

Quote from GM Retser in attempt to provide further clarification to the update: http://forums.play.net/forums/GemStone%20IV/Paid%20Events:%20Adventures,%20Quests,%20and%20SimuCoins/The%20Settlement%20of%20Reim/view/903

Wording it another way;

Premium subscribers are able to enter the Settlement of Reim once a day. A timer starts upon entry that lasts for 22 hours before you can enter it again without paying.

I have expanded that same timers capabilities so that you can use that perk to enter Reim Fortress Defense OR the Settlement of Reim. They use the same timer.

Retser, ASGM
